title: PhD Studentship
institution: EPSRC UKRI Centre for Doctoral Training in Artificial Intelligence and Music (EP/S022694/1), Centre for Digital Music, Queen Mary University of London. Industrial sponsor: Bela (Augmented Instruments Ltd)
description: Covers tuition, living expenses, travel and research budget

title: Turing Enrichment Scheme placement
institution: The Alan Turing Institute, the UK's national institute for data science and artificial intelligence

title: Erasmus+ grant
description: monthly stipend for an undergraduate exchange with RWTH Aachen University

title: German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD) grant for summer language course
description: C1 German course at the Ludwig Maximilian University of Munich (LMU). Stipend covering course fees and accommodation (DAAD Hochshulsommerkurse in Deutschland für ausländische Studierende und Graduierte)
